IGNORE_ERROR:alter table SNP_TXT_CROSSR drop constraint AK_TXT_CROSSR IGNORE_ERROR:alter table SNP_TXT_CROSSR drop constraint PK_TXT_CROSSR alter table SNP_TXT_CROSSR add constraint PK_TXT_CROSSR primary key (STRING_POS, I_TXT) update SNP_TXT_CROSSR set SEQ_ID = I_SEQ Where I_SEQ is not null;
update SNP_LOC_REPW set REP_VERSION = '3.0.01.01'
